headline: BNP Paribas and HSBC Join Privacy-Focused Blockchain Canton
summary: The banks have joined the Canton Foundation, the governance organization that runs the Canton Network.

raw.headline: BNP Paribas and HSBC Join Privacy-Focused Blockchain Canton
raw.summary: The banks have joined the Canton Foundation, the governance organization that runs the Canton Network.

headline: Broadridge Acquires Retirement Plan Technology Provider iJoin
summary: Global Fintech leader Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR) today announced that it has acquired iJoin, a leading retirement plan technology provider specializing in participant onboarding, engagement, and analytics solutions for the retirement industry.
